size.description: the size you want to get

target.description: the user you want to get the avatar of

cmdstats.description: See how often a specific command has been run or get the top 10.

command.description: The command you want to get stats for.

scope.description: Get command stats for either the current guild, you, or the bot overall.

cmdstats.embedDescriptionOne: The {command} command has been run {total} times (Slash: {slash} | Prefix: {prefix}).

dashboard.description: get the link to the bots's dashboard

emoji.description: The emoji or its id you want to get information about

emojiinfo.creator: Creator
emojiinfo.name: Name
emojiinfo.notFound: No information found for this emoji.

help.description: Show all my commands or search for a specific one

category.description: Wich category do you want to get information about?

command.description: Wich command do you want to get information about?

all.embedDescription: These are the different command categories. Please select one from the dropdown menu.
all.embedFooterText: Use the 'command' option to get more information about a specific command.

help.categoryListPlaceholder: Which command category do you want to see?
help.commandListPlaceholder: Which command do you want to see?
help.devEmbedFooterText: Dev-Bot | Only beta commands are shown

info.description: shows some stats and infos about the bot.

invite.description: Sends a link to add the bot to your guild.
invite.embedDescription: Thank you for your interest! Click {link} to add me to your guild. ^^

average.description: Get the average ping out of 60 pings.

average.embedDescription:
Pings: {pings} | Duration: `{duration}s`
API:
> Lowest Ping: `{wsLowest}ms`
> Highest Ping: `{wsHighest}ms`
> Average Ping: `{wsAverage}ms`
Message Send:
> Lowest Ping: `{msgLowest}ms`
> Highest Ping: `{msgHighest}ms`
> Average Ping: `{msgAverage}ms`

role.description: the role you want to get information about

guild_id_or_invite.description: The server ID you want to get information about. Only works for servers I'm in.

uptime.embedDescriptionNoURL: The bot has been online for {time}.

usage.usage: [@user | user name | user tag | user nickname | user id]

target.description: the user you want to get information about

vote.description: get the link to the bots's feature request and voting page
vote.embedDescriptionVote: Click {link} to open the voting and feature request webpage.

wordcounter.description: See how many words were said in a guild, a channel or by a member.

channel.description: See the top members of a channel.

get.description: See the top members of a channel.

channel.description: The target channel. Defaults to this one.

guild.description: See the top channels and top members of a guild.

get.description: See the top channels and top members of a guild.

guild_id.description: The target guild's ID. Defaults to this one.

user.description: Toggle the wordcounter for you or display your word count.

enable.description: Enable or disable the wordcounter for you.

enabled.description: Enable or disable the wordcounter for you.

get.description: See the amount of words you said.

channel.embedDescription: The total amount words sent since the start of recoding at {enabledAt}: {amount}

guild.embedDescription: The total amount words sent since the start of recoding at {enabledAt}: {amount}
guild.invalidGuild: The guild id provided is invalid.

wordcounter.notEnabled: Word counting is not enabled for the selected guild. An Administrator can enable it by running {command}.

get.embedDescription: The total amount words you sent since the start of recoding at {enabledAt}: {amount}
get.notEnabledUser: Word counting is not enabled for you. You can enable it for your user by running {command}.
